newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Sweden's Riksbank sets repo at unchanged 4.10 pct.
newsitem.headline: Sweden's Riksbank sets repo at unchanged 4.10 pct.

text.p: The Swedish central bank, the Riksbank, set a one-week repurchase operation at an unchanged fixed 4.10 percent on Tuesday.
The decision was in line with market expectations. The repo operation will run from July 2 to July 9.
The repo is the bank's key tool for controlling money market liquidity.
The central bank's deposit and lending rate stand at 3.75 percent and 5.25 percent, respectively.
The repo rate has been unchanged since December 17, 1996.
